Package konquest.api.event

package konquest.api.event
The event package includes events that can be handled just like Bukkit events.

For example: 

 
 public class MyExampleListener implements Listener {
        
     public MyExampleListener() {}
        
     @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.NORMAL)
     public void onExampleEvent(KonquestEvent event) {
         // do something
     }
 }
Author:
Rumsfield
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    konquest.api
    The base API package for Konquest.
    konquest.api.manager
    The manager package provides specialized interfaces for specific features in Konquest.
    konquest.api.model
    The model package offers lower-level object interfaces that are managed by the managers.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    KonquestEnterTerritoryEvent
    Called when a player moves into a territory, by walking or teleporting.
    KonquestEvent
    A base event from Konquest
    KonquestKingdomChangeEvent
    Called before the given player has been assigned to the given kingdom (or exiled as barbarian)
    KonquestMonumentDamageEvent
    Called when a town monument is damaged.
